list-item.p: To describe the geometric mean PRNT 50 titre (GMT) at 10 days, 28 days and 1-year post-vaccination of the different doses of the YF vaccine.

To describe the change in PRNT 50 titre (i.e. the geometric mean fold increase (GMFI) as a continuous variable) between baseline and day 28 after vaccination with the different doses of the YF vaccine.
To assess the occurrence of adverse events (AE) over 28 days after vaccination and serious adverse events (SAE) throughout the duration of the studies.
